6.title: PENGUINS
clues: (Lindblad and National Geographic naturalist Tom Ritchie delivers the clue from Antarctica.)  The recent increase in gentoo penguin numbers may be due to decreased sea ice coverage caused by this phenomenon of rising average air temperatures

(Underwater specialist Lisa Trotter delivers the clue from Antarctica.)  Though efficient swimmers, penguins must come up for air, & do so in a method called this, after the way a certain cetacean leaps in and out of the water
